name: Avocado tacos
description: Three soft flour or corn tortillas filled with fresh avocado slices, crisp lettuce, and cilantro. Served with Mexican rice, pico de gallo, and spicy verde sauce. Perfect vegetarian option

name: Carne asada tacos
description: Three authentic corn tortillas filled with marinated grilled steak, seasoned with traditional Mexican spices. Topped with onions and cilantro, served with pico de gallo and homemade spicy sauce

name: Carnitas tacos
description: Three soft corn tortillas filled with tender, slow-braised pork shoulder cooked in traditional Mexican spices. Served with fresh pico de gallo and spicy tomatillo sauce

name: Fish tacos
description: Three flour tortillas filled with seasoned grilled white fish and caramelized onions. Served with Mexican rice, fresh pico de gallo, and creamy chipotle sauce

name: Tacos al pastor
description: Authentic Mexican fusion! Marinated pork with guajillo peppers and achiote, grilled with onions and fresh pineapple. Served with cilantro, onions, lime wedges, and homemade tomatillo sauce

name: Tacos supremos
description: Three soft or crispy shell tacos filled with seasoned shredded chicken or ground beef, topped with lettuce, tomatoes, sour cream, and shredded cheese

name: Tacos de birria
description: Three corn tortillas filled with slow-cooked, spiced beef birria. Served with rich consomm√© broth for dipping, fresh cilantro, diced onions, lime wedges, and spicy sauce
